2. Create connection


```{r}
con <- dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(),
                 dbname = 'sqlda',
                 host = 'postgres', 
                 port = 5432,
                 user = 'postgres', 
                 password = 'stat1234')

    
```
Read a table

```{r}

temp <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT count(*) FROM customers Limit 2;")
temp
dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT count(*) FROM testtest Limit 2;")
```
Create a table in sqlda: 


```{r}

dbSendQuery(con, "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS testtest ")

 dbSendQuery(con, "CREATE TABLE testtest(Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Name VARCHAR(20))")
 dbSendQuery(con, "INSERT INTO testtest VALUES(1,'Shawn Ha'),(2,'Allison Lee')")

```
